page.title: 20THE DOMESDAY DISC POEM
page.content:
In 1985, A new and better Domesday Book Will come alive! On disc instead of book, Everyone will be surprised When later on they look Inside the disc Domesday book.
People all over the world, Will see this piece of work, We write until our pens run out And then we put it on the computer.
If it hadn't been for us, No one would know, How it used to be so long ago. Class 4 of Swaffham Prior School, Studied the parts that they could do, And sent it off to the B.B.C. Where they put it on disc And that's for you and me.
